name: Google Chrome
description: üåê Google Chrome is a fast, secure, and free web browser built by Google. It's known for its speed, simplicity, and security features.

name: Firefox
description: ü¶ä Firefox is a free and open-source web browser developed by Mozilla. It's known for its privacy features, customization options, and strong security.

name: Brave
description: ü¶Å Brave is a privacy-focused web browser that blocks ads and trackers by default. It's built on Chromium and offers faster browsing speeds.

name: Microsoft Edge
description: üåä Microsoft Edge is a modern web browser built on Chromium. It offers excellent performance, security features, and seamless integration with Microsoft services.
